path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - SLS Token - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: The redundancy of Ownable and SafeMath contracts
findings.description: The `Ownable` contract is defined but its functions are not used inside the contract, and all safe math usages in the contract are for overflow checking which solidity `0.8.0+` already does by default.
